/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is teeming with life, with cars and buses navigating their way through the roads. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the roads, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the daylight. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a muted light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban architecture and natural elements. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the cityscape.
